ing: 1/4 fluid ounce spiced rum (such as Captain Morgan'sÂ®)
3/4 fluid ounce melon liqueur (such as MidoriÂ®)
2 fluid ounces sweet and sour mix
1 fluid ounce lemon-lime soda (such as SpriteÂ®)
des: "This tangy and refreshing adult beverage is great on a hot summer evening!"
ins: Fill a cocktail glass with the ice cubes and pour in the rum, melon liqueur, sweet and sour mix, and orange juice. Stir to mix, and top with a splash of lemon-lime soda.
